Global communication: If everyone on Earth spoke the same language, it would be easier to communicate globally. This could lead to better international relations, more efficient business transactions, and a greater sense of global unity.
Cultural exchange: With everyone speaking the same language, it would be easier for people to understand and appreciate different cultures. This could lead to a more diverse and inclusive world.
Education: If everyone spoke the same language, education would be more accessible and efficient. This could lead to a more educated and knowledgeable population.
Travel: With a universal language, travel would be easier and more enjoyable. People would be able to communicate with locals more easily, and cultural barriers would be reduced.

Technology: The development of technology would be accelerated, as people would be able to communicate more efficiently and collaborate more effectively. This could lead to new innovations and breakthroughs in various fields.
